item.description:
At this month's meeting, we will review a number of basic concepts in order to ensure everyone has at least a general idea of the foundation necessary for future discussions. In conjunction with that, we will view a DVD presentation by Steve Nison, titled "Candlestick Charting Basics: Spotting the Early Reversals"

Since this meeting is after-hours, we are free to use the Library's parking lot. Our meeting room is downstairs and to the right (the Peace Dale Room).

Newcomers are certainly welcome, so if you know of others who might be interested in joining us, please refer them to this site or just bring them along to the meeting.

Hope to see you all there!
Ray
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy working the laptop & projector set up.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum
